content: 1st single_crochet of round end off weave end in 12 picot clusters round 4 with beads facing away from you attach thread to any center chain 6 picot lp chain 1 bsc in same space * chain 7 bsc in next chain 6 lp * repeat from * to * around ending with chain 7 slip_stitch into 1st bsc of round round 5 slip_stitch into chain 7 lp chain 2 3 double_crochet hbdc 4 double_crochet hbdc in same lp * 4 double_crochet hbdc 4 double_crochet hbdc in next lp * repeat from * to * around ending with hbdc before finishing the last draw through draw through a lp in the top of the chain 2 draw through all 3 lps on hook round 6& 7 chain 6 double_crochet in same st place * skip 4 double_crochet double_crochet in next st chain 3 double_crochet in same st * v st made repeat from * to * around ending with slip_stitch into 3rd chain st of chain 6 round 8 chain 6 double_crochet in same st place * skip 4 double_crochet double_crochet in next st chain 3 hbdc in same st * v st made repeat from * to * around ending with slip_stitch into 3rd chain st of chain 6 round 9 slip_stitch into chain 3 lp chain 1 single_crochet in same space * double_crochet in next chain 3 lp chain 1 double_crochet in same lp 4 times single_crochet in next chain 3 lp * repeat from * to * around ending with slip_stitch into single_crochet of round chain 1 round 10 with white bead bsc in same single_crochet as joining chain 1 bch with dagger bead chain 1 bsc with another white bead in a same st as 1st bsc * bsc in chain 1 space chain 3 bsc in next chain 1 space chain 2 double_crochet in next double_crochet chain 4 sl st in top of double_crochet st chain 4 bsc in 2nd chain from hook bringing 18 seed beads 1 white seed bead 1 dagger bead 1 white seed bead 18 seed beads up behind st before finishing be sure to draw your stitch up tight before finishing for best effects chain 3 slip_stitch in same place as last slip_stitch chain 4 slip_stitch in same place again three picot cluster with beaded fringe chain 2 bsc in next chain 1 space chain 3 bsc in next chain 1 space with white bead bsc in next single_crochet chain 1 bch with dagger bead chain 1 bsc with another white bead in a same st as 1st bsc * repeat from * to * around ending with slip_stitch into single_crochet of round end off weave ends in slide cover onto glass tree ornament ornament two string 18 green beads 1 white bead 1 green dagger bead 1 white bead * 37 green beads 1 white bead 1 green dagger bead 1 white bead * repeat this pattern till you have 16 dagger beads strung on thread then string 195
